items.todoItem: Know that Paul was chosen by God to be sent out with authority as an ambassador of Jesus Christ.
Know that God has a master plan which He is enacting.
Know that God often uses people to fulfil His plan on the earth.
Know that our faith has brought us into Christ Jesus.
Know that in Christ, we are saints.
Know that Paul’s letter to the Ephesians (God’s Word) is directly addressed to each of us as faithful believers.
Take note that it was Paul’s desire that the saints receive yet more of God’s grace and peace.
Know that grace and peace come from God the Father and from the Lord Jesus Christ.
Know that God is our Father.
Know that the Lord Jesus Christ is equally divine with God the Father.
Know that Jesus is Lord.
Know that Jesus is Saviour.
Know that Jesus is the Messiah.
Know that God is worthy of praise.
Give praise to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.
Know that God is the Father of the Lord Jesus Christ.
Know that God has a Son whose name is Jesus.
Know that the Lord Jesus Christ is the Son of God.
Know that in Christ, we are blessed with every spiritual blessing in heaven.
Thank God for all your spiritual blessings in heaven in Christ.
Know that we were chosen by God in Christ before the creation of the world.
Know that in Christ, we are holy and blameless before God in love.
Know that in Christ, God sees us in our perfected state: holy, without blemish and clothed in the righteousness of His Son.
Don’t put yourself down: God has elevated you to sainthood.
See yourself as God sees you in Christ and know how completely He loves you.
Know that God predestined us to be adopted as His children by Jesus Christ.
Know that it pleased God when He decided to adopt us as His children.
Know that God wants to be a Father to us.
As a beloved child of God, become totally dependent on God your Father.
Know that our adoption as God’s children is for the praise of the glory of His grace.
Praise the glory of God’s loving kindness and favour.
Know that God is gracious.
Know that God has made us accepted in His beloved Son Jesus.
Know that Jesus is God’s only begotten and beloved Son.
Know that in Christ we have been redeemed (liberated by payment of a ransom) through the blood of Jesus.
Know that Jesus is Redeemer.
Know that redemption is man’s greatest need.
Know that in Christ our sins have been forgiven through the ransom blood of Jesus.
Know that God has lavished the riches of His grace upon us.
Know that God gives generously.
Know that God’s grace overflows towards us His children.
Know that God has lavished wisdom and understanding upon us through the abundant riches of His grace.
Know that God has chosen to make known to us the hidden secret of His will.
Know that it pleases God to reveal His will to His children.
Know that God decides and does as He pleases to fulfill His will.
Know that in the fullness of time God will gather together all things which are in Christ, both from in heaven and on earth.
Know that God has positioned His Son Jesus Christ at the centre of His master plan.
Know that we were predestined to obtain an inheritance in Christ by God’s will.
Know that in Christ we have become children and heirs of God.
Know that we were predestined to be part of God’s purpose and plan.
Know that you were no accident of birth.
Know that you were born for a reason.
Know that God works all things after the counsel of His own will.
Know that God is sovereign, having supreme power and authority to rule as He wills.
Know that God does not need or seek advice from anybody.
Know that we were predestined to praise God’s glory.
Live for the praise of God’s glory.
Know that it was the Jews who first hoped in the Messiah.
Know that our trust is in Christ since we heard the Word of Truth.
Know that it was always God’s plan to allow the Gentiles to trust in the Messiah also.
Know that the Word of Truth is the good news of salvation.
Know that we were sealed with the Holy Spirit of promise after we believed.
Know that the Holy Spirit is God’s seal of ownership upon us.
Know that the Holy Spirit is a down payment (pledge) of our inheritance until the redemption of our earthly body.
Know that we are each a purchased possession of the Lord.
Know that we have been purchased by the ransom blood of Jesus.
Know that our possession of the Holy Spirit is for the praise of God’s glory.
Know that faith in Jesus and love towards all of the saints go together hand-in-hand for believers.
Give thanks and pray for your brothers and sisters in Christ.
Know that God is the Father of glory.
Pray that God would give you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the experiential knowledge of His character and will.
Pray that your understanding may be enlightened to know the hope and certainty of His calling.
Pray that you may know and understand the riches of the glory of His inheritance in the body of Christ.
Pray that you may know and experience the working of His great and miraculous power that is given to believers.
Know that God’s power is exceedingly great and mighty.
Know that God wants to demonstrate His mighty power through us so that He might receive glory.
Know that God raised Jesus from the dead.
Know that God demonstrated the exceeding greatness of His power when He raised Jesus from the dead.
Know that God has set Jesus at His own right hand in heaven.
Know that Jesus is set far above every power and name in this world and that which is to come.
Know that there is a world to come after this world.
Know that God has put all things under the feet of Jesus.
Know that Jesus has absolute authority over all things.
Know that God has set Jesus as head over all things to the church.
Know that Jesus is head of the church.
Know that the church is the living body of Jesus on earth.
Know that the church is the fulfilment of Jesus who provides everything for every individual within the body of Christ.
